title: Su-22 FlightGear Development Team Established
content: Goal: high-fidelity Su-22M4 and Su-22UM3K reconstruction for FlightGear.

title: Research Phase Initiated
content: Started gathering historical documents and reference materials.

title: Work on East German Su-22 Manual Translation
GitHub Organization and Project Repositories Created
content: Su-22 FlightGear Development GitHub organization created.

title: Initial Aircraft -set.xml File Created
content: Created first version of the Su-22M4-set.xml for FlightGear.
